data.name: Game Of Seven
data.detailed_description:
In almost every culture, the number 7 is special. There are 7 Days of the Week, 7 Notes on the Musical Scale, and 7 Colors in Light.

'Seven' is an original two-player turn-based game. As most games today are either simplistic “gobble-up” arcade games, “shoot-’em-up” war games, or hours-long fantasy games, Seven -- like Chess, Checkers, and Backgammon -- challenges the intellect, yet also uses that special number 7 in an entirely new way.

This includes:

- 7 by 7 board.
- 7 pieces (angels) per player.
- 7 movement spaces per turn.
- 77 seconds per turn.
- 3 dice per turn, with combinations totaling 7.
- Play vs AI.
- Play vs a random human.
- Play vs friend.
- Worldwide leaderboard.
- Full cross-platform support (Windows, macOS, Android, iOS).

To win: capture the four Gates Of Heaven or banish four of your opponent pieces to the Sheol (dungeon for angels).

data.short_description: 'Seven' is an original two-player turn-based board game that revolves around the number 7. In this game you will command seven angels that move in patterns of the number 7, on a seven by seven board.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I5 | AMD® FX 6350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTS 450 (1 GB) | AMD® R7 250 (2 GB) | Intel Iris Xe G7 (Tiger Lake)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I7 2700K | AMD® Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 580 (1.5 GB) | AMD® Radeon™ RX 560 (4 GB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, 512 MB or ATI Radeon HD 5670, 512 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.20GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
